mainSection.welcomeMessage: Welcome to our support page! We're here to help you with any problems you may be having with our product.

checkbox.label: I agree with Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
checkbox.name: terms

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Got questions? We've got answers! Check out our FAQ section to find answers to the most common questions about StreamVibe.

questions.question: What is StreamVibe?
questions.answer: StreamVibe is a streaming service that allows you to watch movies and shows on demand.

questions.question: How much does StreamVibe cost?
questions.answer: StreamVibe offers a range of subscription plans to suit different needs and budgets.

questions.question: What content is available on StreamVibe?
questions.answer: StreamVibe offers a wide variety of movies, TV shows, documentaries, and more.

questions.question: How can I watch StreamVibe?
questions.answer: You can watch StreamVibe on various devices, including smartphones, tablets, smart TVs, and computers.

questions.question: How do I sign up for StreamVibe?
questions.answer: Visit our website and click on 'Sign Up' to create an account and choose a subscription plan.

questions.question: What is the StreamVibe free trial?
questions.answer: StreamVibe offers a free trial period for new users to explore our content and services.

questions.question: How do I contact StreamVibe customer support?
questions.answer: You can contact our customer support team via email, phone, or the contact form on our support page.

questions.question: What are the StreamVibe payment methods?
questions.answer: We accept various payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, and online payment services.

callToAction.text: Start your free trial today! This is a clear and concise call to action that encourages users to sign up for a free trial of StreamVibe.
